#id=1
#text=Planting a Tree to Bring in Spring A friend gave me a gift .
#id=2
#text=She brought me a tree that I could plant in my own yard and enjoy for years to come .
#id=3
#text=It was a Douglas fir evergreen tree .
#id=4
#text=Spring had come a few weeks before and the temperatures were mild again .
#id=5
#text=One sunny day , I decided to plant my tree .
#id=6
#text=I planted my tree in my backyard .
#id=7
#text=It seemed to be the best place for it .
#id=8
#text=I looked forward to when the tree grew and provided shade and beauty to the landscape .
#id=9
#text=I was so inspired by planting this tree that I decided that I wanted to plant a few more trees .
#text=I went to a local nursery and picked out three more varieties of trees that would grow well in my local area .
#text=I took them home and planted them as long .
#text=In a few years , my backyard will be even more beautiful than it is today due to the short amount of time that it took me to plant a few trees .
